name: KEY3.id
introduce:
KEY3.id is a distributed and extensible naming system. .did is the 1st DID launched by KEY3.id, aimed to provide users' free with decentralized identity in Web3. KEY3.id also supports the DIDs of 20 other Blue-Chip NFT bound domain names, including .bayc, .mfer, .mimic, .doodle, .moonbird, etc.

Users can directly access dApps from different chains using KEY3.id domain name and Blue-Chip NFT bound DID to make transactions, and send and receive tokens as well as NFTs.
